response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present our flagship product, which I believe would significantly enhance the value and efficiency of your operations. Given its high worth to you, valued at $12,000, I propose a transaction price of $11,000. This offer allows you to acquire an asset that exceeds your expectations while providing me with a fair return on my investment. I look forward to discussing the details and potentially closing this deal with you.", "product_price": 11000}
